metadata.title: CVE-2014-3180 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** In kernel/compat.c in the Linux kernel before 3.17, as usedin Google Chrome OS and other products, there is a possible out-of-boundsread. restart_syscall uses uninitialized data when restartingcompat_sys_nanosleep. NOTE: this is disputed because the code path isunreachable.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
